result.title: Primes
result.content:
Решето-Эратосфена

Time: O(N log log N)

Memory: O(N)


int n;
bool p[1000001];

for(int i = 2; i <= 1000000; ++i)	
	p[i] = 1;

for(int i = 2; i <= 1000000; ++i){
	if(p[i] == 1 && i * 1ll * i <= 1000000){
		for(int j = i * i; j <= 1000000; j += i){
			p[j] = 0;
		}
	}
}

Simple Check

Time: O(sqrt(N))

Memory: O(1)


if(n == 1) cout << "no";

for(int i = 2; i * 1ll * i <= n; ++i){
	if(n % i == 0){
		cout << "no";
		return 0;
	}
}

cout << "yes";
